text: A raven, in a very bad state, said to his mother, "Mother, pray to the gods for me and stop weeping". "And which of them will have mercy on you, my son? " his mother asked. Will there be any left of you who haven't yet stolen the meat? Do not fill yourself with enemies unnecessarily, for you will not find a single friend when you need him.
title: El cuervo enfermo
author: nan Esopo
